name: Ship In A Bottle - White
description: Screen printed using a mix of matte and glitter ink on high quality Gildan SoftStyle shirts, these premium quality white tees (look pretty dapper twinned with a check shirt!) include fantastic original artwork by the amazing Sally Renshaw. Available in unisex small, medium and large sizes, please select your preferred size from the drop-down menu above. Text on the boat reads 'Now, Voyager' after the new record - coming in May! To see the design in its full high resolution glory click HERE.
